content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 iron ore, and my inventory now contains 5 coal, 5 stone, and 10 iron ore. 
# Now I can proceed to smelt the iron ore into iron plates using the Stone Furnace.

# I will now insert the iron ore into the furnace to start the smelting process.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert 10 iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inserted iron ore into the furnace. Inventory now: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after inserting iron ore.
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace.status}")  # Check the status of the furnace to see if it is smelting.
